annotation: <history><entry><input>ssh user@fedora-vm</input><output>Welcome to Fedora 38</output><annotation>Connecting to a Fedora virtual machine via SSH.</annotation></entry><entry><input>uname -r</input><output>6.3.8-200.fc38.x86_64</output><annotation>Checking the kernel version of the Fedora VM.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo dnf update -y</input><output>...updating system...</output><annotation>Updating the system packages to the latest versions using `dnf` package manager.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo dnf install htop</input><output>Installing package htop...</output><annotation>Installing the `htop` system monitor tool.</annotation></entry><entry><input>htop</input><output>...output showing system processes...</output><annotation>Launching `htop` to view the running processes and system resources.</annotation></entry><entry><input>exit</input><output></output><annotation>Exiting the Fedora VM after completing the system check and installation.</annotation></entry></history>
